div.h2:
​​​​​​​​For the latest COVID-19 developments impacting Orange County schools, visit
​newsroom.ocde.us/coronavirus-update​

p.img: COVID-19 is a disease caused by a novel strain of coronavirus. The current outbreak began in Wuhan, Hubei Province, China and has since spread to other countries, including the U.S. Cases have ranged from mild to severe, including illnesses that have resulted in death. Here are a few trusted sources for information:​

li.a: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC)
